women_colors.name: Platinum Blonde
women_colors.description: Ultra-light, almost white blonde with cool undertones
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to platinum blonde - very light, almost white blonde with cool silver undertones. Keep the hairstyle exactly the same, only change the color to this ultra-light shade.

women_colors.name: Golden Blonde
women_colors.description: Warm, honey-toned blonde with golden highlights
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to golden blonde - warm, honey-toned blonde with beautiful golden highlights and warm undertones. Maintain the exact hairstyle, only change the color.

women_colors.name: Ash Blonde
women_colors.description: Cool-toned blonde with ashy, matte finish
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to ash blonde - cool-toned blonde with ashy, matte finish and no warm undertones. Keep hairstyle identical, only change color to this sophisticated ash tone.

women_colors.name: Strawberry Blonde
women_colors.description: Blonde with subtle red and pink undertones
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to strawberry blonde - blonde base with beautiful subtle red and pink undertones. Maintain the hairstyle exactly, only change the color to this romantic shade.

women_colors.name: Caramel Brown
women_colors.description: Rich, warm brown with caramel highlights
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to caramel brown - rich, warm brown base with beautiful caramel highlights throughout. Keep the hairstyle the same, only change to this luxurious color.

women_colors.name: Chocolate Brown
women_colors.description: Deep, rich brown like dark chocolate
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to chocolate brown - deep, rich brown color like dark chocolate with subtle shine. Maintain exact hairstyle, only change the color to this decadent shade.

women_colors.name: Auburn
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to auburn - beautiful reddish-brown base with natural copper highlights and warm undertones. Keep hairstyle identical, only change to this stunning color.

women_colors.name: Copper Red
women_colors.description: Vibrant red with metallic copper tones
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to copper red - vibrant red with beautiful metallic copper tones and shine. Maintain the hairstyle exactly, only change the color to this bold shade.

women_colors.name: Burgundy
women_colors.description: Deep red-wine color with purple undertones
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to burgundy - deep red-wine color with subtle purple undertones and rich depth. Keep hairstyle the same, only change to this sophisticated color.

women_colors.name: Jet Black
women_colors.description: Pure, glossy black with blue undertones
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to jet black - pure, glossy black with subtle blue undertones and high shine. Maintain exact hairstyle, only change the color to this classic shade.

women_colors.name: Espresso Brown
women_colors.description: Very dark brown, almost black with coffee tones
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to espresso brown - very dark brown, almost black with rich coffee tones and depth. Keep hairstyle identical, only change to this sophisticated color.

women_colors.name: Rose Gold
women_colors.description: Blonde base with pink and gold undertones
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to rose gold - blonde base with beautiful pink and gold undertones creating a trendy metallic effect. Maintain hairstyle exactly, only change the color.

women_colors.name: Silver Gray
women_colors.instruction: Transform hair to silver gray - sophisticated silver-gray color with cool undertones and metallic shine. Keep hairstyle the same, only change to this modern color.

men_colors.name: Natural Brown
men_colors.description: Classic medium brown, most common natural color
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to natural brown - classic medium brown color, the most common natural hair shade with neutral undertones. Maintain exact hairstyle, only change the color.

men_colors.name: Dark Brown
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to dark brown - deep brown with rich undertones and natural depth. Keep hairstyle identical, only change the color to this classic masculine shade.

men_colors.name: Jet Black
men_colors.description: Pure black with subtle blue undertones
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to jet black - pure black with subtle blue undertones and natural shine. Maintain the hairstyle exactly, only change the color to this bold shade.

men_colors.name: Sandy Brown
men_colors.description: Light brown with sandy, sun-kissed tones
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to sandy brown - light brown with sandy, sun-kissed tones and warm highlights. Keep hairstyle the same, only change to this natural-looking color.

men_colors.name: Ash Brown
men_colors.description: Cool-toned brown with no warm undertones
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to ash brown - cool-toned brown with no warm undertones, sophisticated and modern. Maintain exact hairstyle, only change the color.

men_colors.name: Dirty Blonde
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to dirty blonde - dark blonde with subtle brown undertones and natural variation. Keep hairstyle identical, only change to this versatile color.

men_colors.name: Salt and Pepper
men_colors.description: Natural mix of dark hair with gray throughout
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to salt and pepper - natural mix of dark hair with gray strands throughout, creating a distinguished mature look. Maintain hairstyle, only change the color.

men_colors.name: Silver Fox
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to silver fox - sophisticated all-over silver-gray color with metallic shine and distinguished appearance. Keep hairstyle the same, only change the color.

men_colors.name: Charcoal
men_colors.description: Very dark gray-black with matte finish
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to charcoal - very dark gray-black with matte finish and sophisticated depth. Maintain exact hairstyle, only change to this modern color.

men_colors.name: Chestnut Brown
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to chestnut brown - warm reddish-brown with subtle copper highlights and rich depth. Keep hairstyle identical, only change the color.

men_colors.name: Platinum Blonde
men_colors.instruction: Transform hair to platinum blonde - ultra-light blonde with cool undertones and modern edge. Maintain the hairstyle exactly, only change to this bold color.
